effect.gold_silver: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with happiness, given by `happiness * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.
effect.crystal: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with happiness, given by `happiness * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.

short_effect.gold_silver: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.
short_effect.crystal: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

flavor_text.gold_silver: An attack that is based on loyalty.
flavor_text.crystal: An attack that is based on loyalty.
